abilities.name: Evolutionary Flame
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you play Magmortar from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may use this power. Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned and Confused.

attacks.name: Fire Arrow
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Flame Ball
attacks.effect: You may move a Fire Energy card attached to Magmortar to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
